title: Pixel 4 Digital Wellbeing tracks unusual clock app hours that haven't been spent
content: I recently got a Pixel 4 in the beginning of October, and I have two alarms set on the stock Clock app. For multiple days,  Digital Wellbeing has tracked multiple hours (0.5-3 hours) on the app for the day, when I know for a fact that I have not spent this much time on the app. I tried setting a timer for the clock app, but it continued to persist. I have attached screenshots below:
